Others: The T20 World Cup 2024 game between India and Canada was called off due to wet outfield.
India turn their attention to the Super Eight stage of the tournament now where they will face Afghanistan on Thursday.
Canada's campaign has come to an end, but it was a memorable one where they upset Ireland and can also look forward to an improved chance of making the 2026 T20 World Cup.
Lauderhill is meant to host one more match at this T20 World Cup - Ireland vs Pakistan on Sunday. Both teams have already been eliminated from the tournament.
